item.title: Smoothing Cleanser Kanebo Japan
item.dc:creator: 7uptheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information el_class="demo-post-intro"]

It’s mid-October, and the weather is starting to turn cold here in Great Barrington, MA. We’re dreaming of sunny days and sandy beaches while appreciating the beauty of multi-hued leaves. Though we can’t spend our days lounging on a beach, you can!

We partnered with Joy Mangano, Secret Escapes, San Diego Hat Company, LeLe Sandoughi, and Bluefly to give you the chance to win big. ENTER THE SWEEPSTAKE by October 17th, 2018 for your chance to win a 4-night stay in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic, and the following prizes:

  • $200 Bluefly Gift Card
  • $300 jane iredale Gift Card
  • Three piece luggage set from Joy Mangano
  • $300 Lele Sadoughi Gift Card
  • $300 San Diego Hat Gift Card
[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_advertisement image="643" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information]
From intimate family dinner parties to large corporate holiday parties, we love the merriment and we like our makeup to reflect our festive mood.
[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information el_class="demo-post-party"]

Show Us How You Party

We want to see your holiday eye makeup looks. Show us how you use Let’s Party or one of our other Eye Shadow Kits to create subtle, bold, or shimmery eye makeup looks and we may feature you on our Instagram page. Make sure to tag your posts using @janeiredale and #GoodBeautyStories so we see them!

[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][s7upf_advertisement image="644" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][s7upf_advertisement image="645" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information]

Though we wouldn’t recommend this as an everyday look, the blue-hued holiday eye makeup look would be beautiful if paired with a simple monochromatic outfit. So, pull out your favorite charcoal silk, slip dress and grab Let’s Party because this look is a show stopper!

[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: From intimate family dinner parties to large corporate holiday parties, we love the merriment and we like our makeup to reflect our festive mood.

[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][s7upf_advertisement image="644" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][s7upf_advertisement image="645" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information]

Though we wouldn’t recommend this as an everyday look, the blue-hued holiday eye makeup look would be beautiful if paired with a simple monochromatic outfit. So, pull out your favorite charcoal silk, slip dress and grab Let’s Party because this look is a show stopper!

[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: From intimate family dinner parties to large corporate holiday parties, we love the merriment and we like our makeup to reflect our festive mood.

item.title: Tips for Sweat Proof Makeup
item.dc:creator: 7uptheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information el_class="demo-post-intro"]

It’s mid-October, and the weather is starting to turn cold here in Great Barrington, MA. We’re dreaming of sunny days and sandy beaches while appreciating the beauty of multi-hued leaves. Though we can’t spend our days lounging on a beach, you can!

We partnered with Joy Mangano, Secret Escapes, San Diego Hat Company, LeLe Sandoughi, and Bluefly to give you the chance to win big. ENTER THE SWEEPSTAKE by October 17th, 2018 for your chance to win a 4-night stay in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic, and the following prizes:

  • $200 Bluefly Gift Card
  • $300 jane iredale Gift Card
  • Three piece luggage set from Joy Mangano
  • $300 Lele Sadoughi Gift Card
  • $300 San Diego Hat Gift Card
[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_advertisement image="643" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information]
From intimate family dinner parties to large corporate holiday parties, we love the merriment and we like our makeup to reflect our festive mood.
[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information el_class="demo-post-party"]

Show Us How You Party

We want to see your holiday eye makeup looks. Show us how you use Let’s Party or one of our other Eye Shadow Kits to create subtle, bold, or shimmery eye makeup looks and we may feature you on our Instagram page. Make sure to tag your posts using @janeiredale and #GoodBeautyStories so we see them!

[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][s7upf_advertisement image="644" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][s7upf_advertisement image="645" el_class="demo-ads-post"][/s7upf_advertisement][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][s7upf_information]

Though we wouldn’t recommend this as an everyday look, the blue-hued holiday eye makeup look would be beautiful if paired with a simple monochromatic outfit. So, pull out your favorite charcoal silk, slip dress and grab Let’s Party because this look is a show stopper!

[/s7upf_information][/vc_column][/vc_row]
